mgmt_ip_prefix.title: Management Network Prefix Length
mgmt_ip_prefix.description: Management network prefix length for VSD

mgmt_bridge.title: Management Network Bridge
mgmt_bridge.description: Network Bridge used for the management interface of this component. This will be a Distributed Virtual PortGroup (DVPG) when deploying on vCenter or a Linux network bridge when deploying on KVM. Defaults to the global setting

vmname.title: VM name
vmname.description: Name of the Virtual Machine on the Hypervisor

upgrade_vmname.title: Upgrade VM Name
upgrade_vmname.description: Virtual Machine name of the new VSD. Used during Upgrade only

target_server_type.title: Target Server Type
target_server_type.description: Type of hypervisor environment where VMs will be instantiated. Use 'none' when skipping predeploy.

target_server.title: Target Server IP or FQDN
target_server.description: Hostname or IP address of the hypervisor where VM  will be instantiated. In the case of deployment in a vCenter environment, this will be the FQDN of the vCenter Server. When target_server_type is set to openstack, this property is unused and should be set to 0.0.0.0

vcenter_datacenter.title: vCenter Datacenter Name
vcenter_datacenter.description: Name of the vCenter Datacenter on which the VSD VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Datacenter Name if not defined here.

vcenter_cluster.title: vCenter Cluster Name
vcenter_cluster.description: Name of the vCenter Cluster on which the VSD VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Cluster Name if not defined here.

vcenter_host_reference.title: vCenter Host Reference
vcenter_host_reference.description: Requires ovftool 4.3. Reference to the host on the vCenter cluster on which to deploy Nuage components

vcenter_datastore.title: vCenter Datastore Name
vcenter_datastore.description: Name of the vCenter Datastore on which the VSD VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Datastore Name if not defined here.

vcenter_vmfolder.title: vCenter VM Folder
vcenter_vmfolder.description: Optional path to a folder defined on vCenter where VM will be instantiated

vcenter_host_clusters_folder.title: vCenter Hosts and Clusters Folder
vcenter_host_clusters_folder.description: Optional path to a hosts and clusters folder defined on vCenter where VM will be instantiated

preserve_vm.title: Preserve VSD VM
preserve_vm.description: Shuts down the vm during destroy process, instead of actually deleting them.

aws_upgrade_ami_id.title: Upgrade AWS VSD AMI ID
aws_upgrade_ami_id.description: AMI VSD ID of the latest VSD release. Used only during an upgrade

aws_instance_type.title: AWS Instance Type
aws_instance_type.description: Instance Type to be used for a VSD instance

aws_key_name.title: AWS Keypair Name
aws_key_name.description: Name of the Keypair used to connect to AWS instances

aws_mgmt_eni.title: AWS Management ENI ID
aws_mgmt_eni.description: ENI ID for VSD Instance on Management Subnet

openstack_image.title: OpenStack Image
openstack_image.description: Name of image installed on OpenStack for VSD

openstack_flavor.title: OpenStack Flavor
openstack_flavor.description: Name of instance flavor installed on OpenStack for VSD

openstack_availability_zone.title: OpenStack Availability Zone
openstack_availability_zone.description: Name of availability zone on OpenStack for VSD

openstack_mgmt_network.title: OpenStack Network
openstack_mgmt_network.description: Name of network on OpenStack for VSD

openstack_subnet.title: OpenStack Subnet
openstack_subnet.description: Name of subnet on OpenStack for VSD

openstack_port_security_groups.title: OpenStack Port Security Groups
openstack_port_security_groups.description: Set of security groups to associate with Mgmt interface

cpuset.title: KVM cpuset information
cpuset.description: Cpuset information for cpu pinning on KVM. For example, VSD requires 6 cores and sample values will be of the form [ 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 ]

failed_login_attempts.title: Failed login attempts
failed_login_attempts.description: Lockout the user after reaching the number of failed login attempts

failed_login_lockout_time.title: Failed login lockout time
failed_login_lockout_time.description: Lockout time after failed login attemps

health_monitoring_agent.title: Health monitoring agent
health_monitoring_agent.description: Enables setup of a health monitoring agent

tls_version.title: TLS version
tls_version.description: Deprecated TLS version to use - always set to 1.2 starting in version 6.*

ca_certificate_path.title: Path to CA certificate pem file
ca_certificate_path.description: Path to CA certificate pem file

intermediate_certificate_path.title: Path to intermediate certificate pem file
intermediate_certificate_path.description: Path to intermediate certificate pem file

credentials_set.title: Credentials set name
credentials_set.description: Name of the credentials set for the vsd

vsd_ram.title: VSD RAM
vsd_ram.description: Amount of VSD RAM to allocate, in GB. Note: Values smaller than the default are for lab and PoC only. Production deployments must use a value greater than or equal to the default.
vsd_ram.warning: Values smaller than the default are for lab and PoC only. Production deployments must use a value greater than or equal to the default.
vsd_ram.sectionBegin: VSD RAM, CPU and Disk Parameters

vsd_fallocate_size_gb.title: VSD Disk Size
vsd_fallocate_size_gb.description: Amount of VSD disk space to pre-allocate, in GB. Note: Values smaller than the default are for lab and PoC only. Production deployments must use a value greater than or equal to the default.
vsd_fallocate_size_gb.warning: Values smaller than the default are for lab and PoC only. Production deployments must use a value greater than or equal to the default.
vsd_fallocate_size_gb.sectionEnd: VSD RAM, CPU and Disk Parameters
